caption:
Table 1: Test accuracy (%) for all competing methods on CIFAR-10 and CIFAR-100 under 
symmetric and asymmetric noises. Results from related approaches are as presented in [30]. 
Top methods within 1% are in bold.

Table 2: Test accuracy (%) for the semantic noise benchmark [26], where baseline results 
are from [26]. The results with (*) were produced by locally running the published code 
provided by the authors. Top methods (?1%) are in bold.

Table 4: Test accuracy (%) for Red Mini-
ImageNet [23]. Results from baseline 
methods are as presented in [53]. Top 
methods (?1%) are in bold.

Table 6: In this ablation study we show the test accuracy (%) on CIFAR-10 and CIFAR-
100 under symmetric and asymmetric noise problems. First, we show the results of self-
supervised pre-training with SCAN
